model:   Layer 1 (Topology): Structural mixing defeats pattern attacks   Layer 2 (LBLO): Binary-Error LWE hides control functions (~2^120 PQ)   Layer 3 (Wire Binding): Full-rank linear map prevents mix-and-match   Layer 4 (Weak LWE Puzzle): ~2^20 work per guess (not GPU-friendly) Flow:   1. Solver finds puzzle solution s for input x (off-chain, ~2^20 work)   2. Contract verifies ||As - b|| < threshold (cheap, ~20K gas)   3. Contract uses H(s) as key to evaluate TLOS circuit   4. Contract checks output matches expected Security effect:   - Current: 25M guesses/sec on GH200   - With puzzle: ~10-100 guesses/sec (BKZ is memory-bound, not GPU-friendly)   - 2^30 crack time: 43 sec -> 4-40 months","kind":"dev","methods":{"commit(bytes32)":{"params":{"commitHash":"Hash of (sender, input, puzzleSolution)"}},"commitDelay()":{"returns":{"_0":"Number of blocks to wait"}},"encryptedGates()":{"returns":{"_0":"Number of NTRU/LWE encrypted gates"}},"estimatedGas()":{"returns":{"_0":"Approximate gas units needed"}},"getCommit(address)":{"params":{"committer":"The address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"The committed hash (0 if none)","_1":"The block when committed (0 if none)"}},"revealWithPuzzle(bytes32,int8[48])":{"params":{"input":"The secret input x","puzzleSolution":"The weak LWE solution s \u2208 {-1,0,1}^48"}},"reward()":{"returns":{"_0":"The ETH reward in wei"}},"scheme()":{"returns":{"_0":"Scheme name (e.g., \"min-core\", \"multi-gate-16\")"}}},"title":"TLOSWithPuzzle - 4-Layer TLOS with Weak LWE Brute-Force Resistance","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"Claimed(address,bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the
